title: Imbued guthix cape (Last Man Standing)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The imbued guthix cape in Last Man Standing is a minigame-exclusive variant of the imbued guthix cape. It is available at the start of the game as part of the starting loadout. Some players choose to drop this item once they obtain the Infernal cape (Last Man Standing) within the minigame, however, that reduces the player's ability to deal sustained magical damage.

Item ID23603

The imbued guthix cape in Last Man Standing is a minigame-exclusive variant of the imbued guthix cape. It is available at the start of the game as part of the starting loadout. Some players choose to drop this item once they obtain the Infernal cape (Last Man Standing) within the minigame, however, that reduces the player's ability to deal sustained magical damage.

[[File:Imbued guthix cape (Last Man Standing) detail.png|left|150px]]
The '''imbued guthix cape''' in [[Last Man Standing]] is a minigame-exclusive variant of the [[imbued guthix cape]]. It is available at the start of the game as part of the starting loadout. Some players choose to drop this item once they obtain the [[Infernal cape (Last Man Standing)]] within the minigame, however, that reduces the player's ability to deal sustained magical damage.
